snippet.title: The Settlers 4 gameplay (PC Game, 2001)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for The Settlers 4, PC game produced by 1C Company in 2001 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/the-settlers-fourth-edition/11362/
The single-player campaign, following a loose plot of medieval intrigue, puts you in control of the hero. You use serfs to build structures, after which little workers, whom you have little power over, come to work in the mines and factories and other buildings.
Played through modern Windows machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
The Settlers - https://youtu.be/QF0AHp7JDV8
The Settlers 2 - https://youtu.be/Qua2kb5GgQI
Black & White - https://youtu.be/0tClx5FdWPg
